name: Mayfair
description: What is the project about? DTF trading platform on arbitrum What makes your project unique? Mayfair allows to to trade narratives rather than coins/tokens due to their DTF platform. This allows users to play/trade the market in a different way than they normally would. Mayfair is one of the only places a user can trade using DTFs and the project is actively adding more DTFs to trade. History of your project.
